name: Boat Rescue Mission in Flood: Coast Emergency Rescue & Life Saving Simulation Game
name_original: Boat Rescue Mission in Flood: Coast Emergency Rescue & Life Saving Simulation Game
description:
Cities are devastated by sever rains and floods, people need rescue and help.
You are provided with latest life boats to rescue them to the main ship.
Find all the survivors, get them on your boat and help them reach the Ship.
Missions are designed to educate kids and adults about the conditions in sever floods,
and how to help those stuck in there, provide them food and supplies to save lives.

Top Features

-> Sever Flood conditions
-> Latest Life boats
-> Save people stuck in water
-> Provide food and water supplies
-> Save lives
